ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31th day of October, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED as to the first issue only; the petition is DENIED as to the second issue. The Commonwealth Court’s order is vacated and the matter remanded for reconsideration in light of Vista Int’l Hotel v. WCAB (Daniels), 560 Pa.12, 742 A.2d 649 (1999) and this Court’s order in Hill v. WCAB (Ballard, Spahr, Andrews & Ingersoll), 805 A.2d 509, 2001 WL 1944738 (Pa. 2002).
